text: "Diamond Dogs" is a 1974 song by David Bowie. It is the title track to his eighth studio album of the same name. It went to number 21 in the United Kingdom. It was not issued in the United States. It was covered by Duran Duran for their 1995 album Thank You. ==Track listing== All tracks were written by David Bowie. # "Diamond Dogs" – 5:56 # "Holy Holy" – 2:20 In Australia, a 2'58" edit of "Diamond Dogs" was used (RCA 102462) instead of the full-length album version. ==References== Category:1974 songs Category:David Bowie songs Category:Duran Duran songs Category:Blues rock songs Category:Garage rock songs Category:Beck songs
title: Diamond Dogs (song)
